Attributes.description: Spanish colonialism in the Americas from the Conquest to the 1820's and the dawn of Independence. Includes coloniality, hybridity, subalternity, and autonomy.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: SPAN 221. (; and SPAN 301 or equivalent expertise in written and spoken Spanish.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed, Start Time: 9:30, End Time: 11:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: D204
